subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wilson Ramos hit a three-run double and Ian Desmond had a solo home run during Washington’s six-run third inning, and the Nationals beat the Red Sox, 10-5.
snippet: Wilson Ramos hit a three-run double and Ian Desmond had a solo home run during Washington’s six-run third inning, and the Nationals beat the Red Sox, 10-5.
